EmailTemplate.subject: VinPro Realignment Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
As you’re aware, VinSolutions is growing rapidly and in an effort to enhance your customer service experience, we are expanding the VinPro team in your region. This expansion of the VinPro department will improve our efforts to provide consistent and effective customer service. Obviously by dividing the workload, this allows your assigned VinPro to be more readily available to address your needs. Moving forward, if your assigned VinPro is unavailable; you may contact the other VinPro in your region to get immediate assistance.
We would like to introduce your newly assigned VinPro, Danny Pinon.
Danny Pinon Over 30 years of retail automotive experience. Management, desking, new, used and internet sales. Many years in the finance department as a closer, producer, director, and sub-prime specialist, very knowledgeable with the used car market, clocking many hours at the auctions as a buyer. Most recently as an independent dealer.
Danny Pinon danny.pinon@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 123
*If for any reason your VinPro is out of the office or cannot assist you; you may contact Sarah McDannel.
Sarah McDannel I have worked as an internet director in dealerships for over 10 years. I understand the inner workings of dealerships, and have been committed to constant success of each and every team I have been a part of. Because I have been in your shoes and been a part of a team just like yours, I know that I can work with you to ensure you have the best possible relationship with VinSolutions and hopefully you will allow me to be a valued asset to your dealership and dealership’s personnel.
Sarah McDannel sarah.mcdannel@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 135
We are very excited about our continued growth at VinSolutions and look forward to providing you with the customer service you deserve.
Sincerely,
Kevin L. Broderick
Regional VinPro Manager - Eastern US
